short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vastly enhances the layout of a certain website so that you can absorb more information than ever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For some reason a giant billboard appears in front of the interesting bits of information on this website. This plug-in automatically removes it, rendering the text readable.
